title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black (Model 2554A)**

Clean your home with the power and convenience of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. This innovative, cordless vacuum cleaner and mop combo is perfect for hard floors and area rugs, designed to make your cleaning routine easier and more efficient.

**Key Features and Benefits:**

- **Rotating Brush System**: Experience improved edge cleaning and deep dirt extraction with our advanced rotating brush system.
- **10.5-Inch Cleaning Path Width**: Clean a larger area with each pass, making your cleaning tasks quicker and more efficient.
- **Swivel Head and Carry Handle**: Navigate tight corners and bulky furniture with ease, and carry your vacuum with ease wherever you need it.
- **Cordless with 36V Lithium-Ion Battery**: Enjoy up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time, giving you the freedom to tackle your entire home.
- **Two-Tank Technology**: Our dual-tank system keeps your water and dirt separate, enhancing cleaning performance and reducing messy spills.
- **WiFi Connected Capabilities**: Connect to the BISSELL Connect app for remote control, scheduling, and real-time cleaning performance monitoring.
- **Self-Cleaning Cycle**: Keep your vacuum clean and ready to use with our built-in self-cleaning cycle.
- **Multi-Surface Compatibility**: Clean a variety of surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, and pressed wood floors.
- **Area Rug Cleaning**: Effectively clean and refresh your area rugs without damaging them.
- **Included Accessories**: Two Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, two Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and two Multi-Surface Brush Rolls are included to help you get the perfect clean.
- **Charitable Support**: A portion of your purchase supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping to make a difference in the lives of pets in need.

**Why Choose the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max?**

- **Efficiency**: Save time and effort with our improved edge cleaning and wide cleaning path.
- **Convenience**: Cordless operation and WiFi connectivity make cleaning anywhere in your home a breeze.
- **Effectiveness**: Multi-tasks as both a vacuum and a mop, and clean a variety of surfaces with ease.
- **Charity**: Be a part of something bigger while keeping your home spotless.

Transform your cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. Click to order now and make your home cleaning experience more enjoyable and efficient!
